chess.IllegalMoveException

Package Description

  • Uses of IllegalMoveException in chess

    Methods in chess that throw IllegalMoveException 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void Chess.askForInput()
    askForInput Method which takes in user input for moving pieces with or without promotion, requesting a draw, declaring a draw, and resigning
    int Board.movePiece​(Position p, Position np, Piece prom, int s)
    movePiece Method This method is responsible enacting a player's move by calling for the piece at position p to move to position np.
    abstract void Piece.moveTo​(Position newpos, Piece promotion)
    Abstract moveTo Method For each Piece implementation: Performs various legality checks on requested movement.
